Package com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.web

Contains request validation framework classes

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ISCUIInputValidationAdapter
    This interface defines methods which should be implemented by any validation adapter.
    ISCUIValidationAdapterKey
    This interface defines a key with which validation adapters are registered.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SCUIClassLoaderHelper
    This class keeps war class loader per application id.
    SCUIHeaderValueRuleRegistry
    This registry takes care of case insensitive header names.
    SCUIJavascriptRuleContainerRegistry
    This registry implementation is capable of containing javascript validator function along with the ISCValidationRule.
    SCUIQueryStringValidationRule
    This class validates a query string by breaking it into individual parameters/values and then validating them individually.
    SCUIRequestValidatorFilter
    This filter does the force request validations by calling request getters for most of the inputs.
    SCUISafeRequestFilter
    This filter wraps the request object in a SCUISafeRequestWrapper class which takes care of validating any input accessed through request.
    SCUISafeRequestWrapper
    This wrapper wraps HttpServletRequest object in order to validate all request inputs.
    SCUIURIContextRuleResolverAdapter
    This adapter finds validation rules for a particular parameter based on following rules - This adapter first looks for all the rules defined in the context of current request URI.
    SCUIURIContextValidationAdapterKey
    This is a implementation of ISCUIValidationAdapterKey which has a input type and corresponding URI as the key for a adapter.
    SCUIURIContextValidationRuleKey
    This is a implementation of ISCValidationRuleKey which has a input name and corresponding URI as the key for a validation rule.
    SCUIValidationInitServlet
    This servlet initializes default validation rule for various request inputs.
    SCUIWebValidationConstants
    This class defines constants used in request validation framework.
    SCUIWebValidationContext
    This class provides validation related contextual information.
    SCUIWebValidationHelper  
    SCUIWebValidationUtils
    Utility class for request validation framework.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SCUIRequestValidationException
    This is a runtime exception which is thrown when an request input validation fails.

Package com.sterlingcommerce.security.dv.web Description

Contains request validation framework classes
